speaker: Counter
lines: You lean on the counter scarred by years of work.
You read a slate listing iron by the pound and labor rates.
A small bell rests on the edge; you ignore it.
An open ledger waits for the next order.
The smith taps a quill and looks at you.
'Artifact work is dangerous,' he says. 'Commissions pay steady.'
He studies your hands and waits for your choice.

choices.text: Take a commission from the board.
